title: Matale Field Officers get 1000 motorcycles
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana President Mahinda Rajapaksa who attended several programmes in Matale District yesterday (12 August), distributed over 1000 motorcycles among field officers attached to the state services. They had all the reason to smile as this is another step taking forward the program of providing motorcycles to state…
